entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:39 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 3:02 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: E 33 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
